title: Best Christmas Pudding
ingredients: ['100g raisins', '150g sultanas', '150g figs, chopped', '75g candied peel, chopped', '100g glace cherries, such as Billington’s Natural Glace Cherries, halved', '80ml brandy', '1 orange juice and zest', '100g butter, unsalted, softened and beaten', 'a little extra butter for greasing the bowl', '165g muscovado sugar, such as Billington’s Dark Muscovado Sugar', '3 eggs, beaten', '100g self raising flour', '100g breadcrumbs', '30g almonds, ground', '1 eating apple, grated']
